rows.label: bf02080100_0010
rows.name: Oh. Still awake, I see.

rows.label: bf02080100_0020
rows.name: I can't seem to sleep.

rows.label: bf02080100_0030
rows.name: It's good to see you again...[System:Ruby rt=One of the Four Heaven Guardians Representing East ]Seiryuu-san[/System:Ruby].

rows.label: bf02080100_0040
rows.name:
Likewise. Though you've changed
a lot since last we met, Homura.

rows.label: bf02080100_0050
rows.name: I suppose I have. A lot's happened.

rows.label: bf02080100_0060
rows.name:
Yes it has. I wanted to thank you 
for saving my dear Rex.

rows.label: bf02080100_0070
rows.name:
And I need to know - what you told
him, is that what you really intend?

rows.label: bf02080100_0080
rows.name:
Yes.
It is my true desire.

rows.label: bf02080100_0090
rows.name:
I see. Well, that's good enough.
I have no reason to doubt you, Homura.

rows.label: bf02080100_0100
rows.name:
That said...
I do have one other goal now.

rows.label: bf02080100_0110
rows.name: Shin and Metsu.

rows.label: bf02080100_0120
rows.name:
I cannot allow them to continue
with their current course.

rows.label: bf02080100_0130
rows.name: That is the fate of the Heavenly Holy Grail, after all.

rows.label: bf02080100_0140
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: bf02080100_0150
rows.name: Will you involve him? Rex I mean.

rows.label: bf02080100_0160
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf02080100_0170
rows.name: I'm not blaming you.

rows.label: bf02080100_0180
rows.name:
That boy will find some way to stick his neck into danger
even if you didn't want him to.

rows.label: bf02080100_0190
rows.name:
I see half your Core is missing.
Seems you've taken on quite a burden.

rows.label: bf02080100_0200
rows.name: Seiryuu-san, I...

rows.label: bf02080100_0210
rows.name: Promise me you'll take care of Rex.

rows.label: bf02080100_0220
rows.name: I will.
